name: Triangle Man!
description:
Click/tap Triangle Man to earn points!! Avoid the backgrounds tho. You can comment your score and I will add your name in the high scores section! (Top 5 only)

This is my first game, I just started learning about coding. Tips, critiques and suggestions are very welcomed! 

High scores:

1. SkyCharger - 19

2.

3.

5.

Please share the games with your friends!

current bugs:

-Clicking triangle man twice quickly will bug out his sprite.

-Clicking on the background in the main menu will cause the game over screen to appear.
